#summary GEToolStrip control notes
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

http://earthapi.googlepages.com/GEToolStrip_6.jpg

= Introduction =

The GEToolStrip control integrates with the GEWebBrowser to provide controls for the basic options in the Google Earth Plug-in. 


= Details =

The GEToolStrip inherits from the standard [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.forms.toolstrip.aspx System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip] control class

== Constructor == 

_GEToolStrip_ *GEToolStrip()*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the GEToolStrip class

== Public Properties ==

_Bool_ *ShowNavigationItems*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation items are visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowLayersDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Layers drop down menu is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowOptionsDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Options drop down menu is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowViewDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the View drop down menu is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowImageryDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Imagery drop down menu is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowScreenGrabButton*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the screen grab button is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowViewInMapsButton*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the show in maps button is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowLanguageCombobox*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the language combobox is visible <br>

_Bool_ * UseAutoCompleteSugestions*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation box should use auto-complete<br>

== Public methods ==

_void_ *AddAutoCompleteSuggestions(System.string[] suggestions)*<br>
Adds multiple sting entries to the Auto Complete suggestion list<br>
*Parameters*<br>
suggestions: The collection of entries to add<br>

_void_ *AddAutoCompleteSuggestions(System.string suggestion)*<br>
Adds a string entry to the Auto Compleate suggestion list<br>
*Parameters*<br>
suggestion: The entry to add<br>

_void_ *ClearAutoCompleteSuggestions()*<br>
Removes all entries from the Auto Compleate suggestion list

_void_ *SetBrowserInstance(FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEWebBrowser browser)*<br>
Set the browser instance for the control to work with<br>
*Parameters*<br>
browser: The GEWebBrowser instance to associate with the control<br>
